upload.invalidFile: Please select a valid video file

videoList.getStarted: Upload a video to get started

analysis.readyDescription: Click "Start Analysis" to begin pose detection and biomechanics calculation
analysis.detectingPose: Detecting pose keypoints and calculating biomechanical metrics...
analysis.climberMetricsDescription: Enter your height and arm span to display metrics in real-world units (meters) instead of normalized units.

tooltips.efficiency: Ratio of useful movement toward the goal vs total movement. Higher values indicate more direct, economical climbing with less wasted motion.
tooltips.duration: Total time of the analyzed climbing sequence from first to last detected frame.
tooltips.dyno: Count of dynamic moves detected when acceleration exceeds a threshold, indicating jumps or powerful movements where contact is momentarily lost.
tooltips.velocity: Peak speed of the center of mass during the climb. Calculated as the rate of position change between frames.
tooltips.acceleration: Maximum rate of velocity change, indicating the most explosive or dynamic moment in the climb.
tooltips.distance: Total path length traveled by the center of mass throughout the climb.

beta.title: AI Beta Suggestion

beta.basedOn: Based on your movement analysis data

poseDetection.description: 33-point body keypoint detection using MediaPipe for accurate movement tracking
